LanguageData.GrenadeHE.label: фугасний
LanguageData.GrenadeHE.description: The high-explosive charge detonates on impact, scattering lethal shell fragments in a large area.
LanguageData.GrenadeHEDP.label: фугасний подвійної дії
LanguageData.GrenadeHEDP.description: Grenade with a shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor.
LanguageData.GrenadeHETF.label: фугасний повітрянний
LanguageData.GrenadeHETF.description: Grenade with a timed fuze designed to detonate mid-flight for maxiumum effectiveness.
LanguageData.GrenadeEMP.label: ЕМІ
LanguageData.GrenadeEMP.description: Creates an electro-magnetic burst on impact, temporarily disrupting electronic systems and Mechanoids.
LanguageData.GrenadeIncendiary.label: Запальний
LanguageData.GrenadeIncendiary.description: Filled with incendiary agent. The agent is dispersed on impact, covering the area in flames.
LanguageData.Smoke.label: Димовий
LanguageData.Smoke.description: Filled with a smoke-producing agent. Explodes on impact to generate a thick smokescreen.
LanguageData.CNGas.label: Сльозогінний газ
LanguageData.CNGas.description: Filled with a non-lethal chemical agent capable of causing pain, irritation, and temporary blindness.
LanguageData.Toxic.label: Токсичний
LanguageData.Toxic.description: Filled with tox gas, a caustic agent that burns the lungs and eyes. Continued exposure to it results in toxic buildup which can be lethal.
